mapper.select: SELECT A.report_num, A.board_num, A.user_id as reported_id, A.report_content, A.report_time, A.state,B.title, B.user_id, B.type_num, C.category_name, D.type_name FROM board_report A JOIN board B ON A.board_num=B.board_num JOIN report_category C ON A.category_num=C.category_num JOIN board_type D ON B.type_num=D.type_num ORDER BY A.report_num DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE board_report SET state='Y' WHERE report_num=#{param1};
